stocks.ai_explanation: Exxon Mobil Corporation (XOM) is a major American multinational corporation involved in the exploration, production, transportation, refining, marketing, and distribution of petroleum products. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Chevron Corporation (CVX) is a large integrated oil and gas company headquartered in San Ramon, California. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Neste Oil Company (NEE) is a Finnish oil company focused on producing biofuels and other sustainable fuels. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
Shell plc (SHEL) is a British multinational oil and gas company. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
British Petroleum (BP) is a multinational oil and gas company based in London. This is an educational summary, not financial advice.
